0);">chrome</span>.<span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">action</span>.<span style="font-style:italic;">setBadgeText</span><span style="color: rgb(97, 170, 13);">({ </span><span style="color: rgb(135, as="points"> <mxPoint x="60" y="310" /> <mxPoint x="60" y="545" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 418px; height: 1px; padding-top: 135px; margin-left: 28px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div:
bridge.connectToBackground:
managedTab: = LocalStorage.getItem('tabsets.managed')
.send('update.indicator.icon',
payload: { managed: managedTab } })
visibiliyChange (i.e. activagted)
managedTab: = LocalStorage.getItem('tabsets.managed')
.send('update.indicator.icon',
payload: { managed: managedTab } })

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 148px; margin-left: 528px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 418px; height: 1px; padding-top: 466px; margin-left: 28px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

span.style: background-color: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); white-space: normal; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 51, 179), rgb(152, 196, 255));
background-color: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); white-space: normal; color: light-dark(rgb(42, 140, 124), rgb(71, 155, 141));
color: light-dark(rgb(8, 8, 8), rgb(230, 230, 230)); background-color: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); white-space: normal;
background-color: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); white-space: normal; color: light-dark(rgb(63, 145, 1), rgb(89, 160, 36));
background-color: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); white-space: normal; color: light-dark(rgb(6, 125, 23), rgb(84, 186, 99));
background-color: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); white-space: normal; color: light-dark(rgb(63, 145, 1), rgb(89, 160, 36));
background-color: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); white-space: normal; color: light-dark(rgb(188, 11, 162), rgb(255, 144, 255));

pre.style: color: light-dark(rgb(8, 8, 8), rgb(230, 230, 230)); font-family: "JetBrains Mono", monospace;

div.pre:
if (msg)
chrome.action.setBadgeText({ text: '✅' })
else
chrome.action.setBadgeText({ text: '' })

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
